casebody.data:
NOVEMBER TERM 1792.

Harris against Grantham. The court will on motion discharge a party arrested whilst attending' his business at the Court of Common Pleas.

GRANTHAM had been arrested by process from this court; while attending to his business at the Inferiour Court of Common Pleas for the county of Cumberland. On motion of Giles he was discharged from the arrest. A common appearance was insisted on but denied by the court.
